snippet: Dani Reiss, president and chief of Canada Goose, a maker of extreme weather outerwear, seems an imperturbable traveler, given his mishap-filled attempt on the South Pole.
abstract: Frequent Flier column features Dani Reiss, president and chief executive of Canada Goose, discussing his flying experiences.
lead_paragraph: Dani Reiss, president and chief of Canada Goose, a maker of extreme weather outerwear, seems an imperturbable traveler, given his mishap-filled attempt on the South Pole.

headline.main: Walking 20 Miles for a (Canceled) Flight to Antarctica
headline.print_headline: Walking 20 Miles for a (Canceled) Flight to Antarctica
